TopicTitle: Crash problem while i playing game.

it's randomly occur crash. it was all fine when i used demo ver. I attach files below, please help me. i enjoying this game really! thanks

Welcome to the forums!

In two of those output logs, the crash is clearly caused by running of memory. KSP is usually limited to about 3.5 GB of RAM even if you have more available on your computer.

I see you have Active Texture Management installed Ã¢â‚¬â€œ if you're using ATM-basic, try switching to the other version (formerly known as ATM-aggressive). If not, you'll need to increase the scale setting in GameData/ActiveTextureManagement/config.cfg, or change the Texture Quality under the Graphics Settings.
